segments.text: Is there anything that you are interested in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Is this your new product this year ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . It's a prototype of our new product . It has got more advantages than the second did .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When is the product going to be on the market ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It will be released next month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So soon ? It seems to be in the early stages .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have developed new technology about it . And the new product will be a pleasure to be hold .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it's sounding good ! I'm looking forward to that .
segments.speaker: S2
